mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_STAFFID as "${columnPrefix}staffId", ${tableAlias}S_PARAMNAME as "${columnPrefix}paramName", ${tableAlias}S_PARAMVALUE as "${columnPrefix}paramValue", ${tableAlias}S_REMARK as "${columnPrefix}remark", ${tableAlias}I_SORTID as "${columnPrefix}sortId", ${tableAlias}S_UNITCODE as "${columnPrefix}unitCode"
